managementResponses.response: We are glad to hear you were satisfied with our hotel and location to SFO.  Your comments regarding our staff and breakfast were appreciated.  Thank you for staying with us.  We hope you will be back when your business has you in this area.

review.title: Quick Trip
review.reviewText:
In San Francisco for a very short business trip. Arrived very late, 3:00 AM as a result of flight delays and staff quickly checked me in and room was ready.  Short (very) nap, then business breakfast at the hotel and meal was satisfactory and staff quick with the coffee.

Was able to use a small alcove off the lobby for my second meeting and that was very helpful.  Enough privacy to conduct business and very comfortable.  

Then off to the city for late afternoon meeting and redeye back to NYC.
review.negativeRemarks: I was happy with my room and value
review.locationRemarks: good if you need to be close to SFOI

managementResponses.response: We are glad to hear our staff provided a satisfactory experience.  We appreciate you staying with us.

review.title: Nice hotel close to BART station.
review.reviewText: The staff were all very courteous and accommodating.  The room was clean and quiet. Had not stayed at a Crowne Plaza before, but will definitely stay at one again.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, reasonably priced, and close to the BART station.
review.negativeRemarks: The skincare products provided (shampoo, conditioner and lotion).  Silly, I know, but was not too crazy about the smell.
review.locationRemarks: Hannabi is a great ramen place.  Burlingame street has a wonderful old town feel and great shops.  BART is around the corner too.

managementResponses.response: We are sorry our hotel did not meet your expectations.  We are renovating our rooms this year and hope to have another chance to serve you.

review.reviewText: This hotel was not to the expected standards for the price.

managementResponses.response: We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay.  We are scheduled to renovate our rooms this year.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have another chance to serve you upon the completion of our renovations.

review.title: Not at all a Crown Plaza facility
review.reviewText:
Bed and linens were good. Furniture and decorations more like a motel. Large window across from bed looked into a hugh expanse of black flat roofing with HVAC equipment. TV was on right side of bed do could only watch tv by lying on your side.

Breakfast food in metal serving dishes was cold and buffet line lacked on demand egg  prep

managementResponses.response: We regret the noise nearby inconvenienced your stay.  We are glad to hear that overall you had a great stay.  Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to another chance to serve you.

review.title: San Francisco getaway
review.reviewText: This hotel was very clean. The beds are comfy and despite many people coming and going , it's very quite. My only complaints are the heavy construction going on around the hotel. Looks like they are expanding the streets and adding to the nearby freeway. Also paying $20 a day for parking is a bummer but I guess that is the norm for the San Fran area, still much cheaper than the rates in the city. Overall it was a great stay I would stay again .

managementResponses.response: We are sorry to hear that the value of your room was below expectations. We realize there are other hotels in the area to choose from and you don't plan to stay here again. We are renovating our rooms this year and hope to have another opportunity to serve you.

review.title: Close to Airport
review.reviewText: The hotel is close to Airport and most airport hotels are average at best. There was construction outside the hotel on roads and bridges making car travel difficult. The rooms were very old and outdated, not kept up, nor clean. For the price, I would chose one of the many other hotels around airport. I chose this one based on view on their web site. My room was expensive and looked out freeway

managementResponses.response: We are sorry to hear you had a less than pleasant stay with us.  The item you mentioned were discussed with our Housekeeping Manager.  We regret this happened.

review.reviewText: Dirty towels, couldn't get wi-fi to work. Unexpected parking fee but they did agree to waive it. Room didn't feel very clean and did not like the location.

managementResponses.response: We regret your stay was noisy as we have upgraded our guest room windows in order to reduce the traffic noise.  Thank you for staying with us.

review.reviewText: totally is ok. its clean for 3 stars hotel. but its far from San Francisco city center. and its noisy because its beside the highway.

managementResponses.response: We sincerely apologize for the loss of your coins.  I have spoken to both the housekeeping manager and room attendant.  She mistakenly thought it was a tip.  We have reminded all our attendants to ensure this does not happen again.  I tried to contact you, but your voicemail box was full.

review.title: Don't leave out any valuables
review.reviewText: The stay was fine until the cleaning staff came into my room to clean and took money off of the dresser that I had left out. I spoke with management, but they really didn't do anything about it.  They said the maid probably thought it was a tip. Tips sre usually given when you check out, not during the middle of your stay when all of your personal belongings are in the room. I felt as though they just blew me off. That will be the last time I ever stay at the Crowne Plaza resort.

managementResponses.response: We regret you were disappointed with the shuttle service and parking charge.  We have a third party party managing the parking operations and therefore the parking fee.  The shuttle runs every 20 minutes between 4 AM - 1 AM.

review.title: Nice hotel, close to the airport and freeway but .
review.reviewText:
Don't rely on shuttle service if you have an early morning or late night flight.  They'll ask you to take a cab for $20.  Similarly don't expect to park free as a guest, overnight parking is $20!

Given that this hotel bills at a premium over other hotels in the area, it was a major disappointment.  Go elsewhere, save yourself $40.

managementResponses.response: We appreciate you nice review of the room and value.  We were disappointed to hear you found our breakfast buffet was not good for you at the price you paid.  We have other breakfast selections that are priced well below the buffet.  Thank you for staying with us.

review.reviewText:
The price of the room was fair, room was realy clean.
Breakfast not so good for $20.00 per person, for that price could have eaten better somewhere else.

managementResponses.response: We appreciate your review of our restaurant/bar staff.   Thank you very much!

review.reviewText: Amazing view, restaurant, bar and staff loved every bit of it.

managementResponses.response: We are glad to hear your stay was great!  Our parking operations is managed by a third party and we understand why you felt the $20 got to you.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.

review.reviewText: Great hotel! Beds were comfortable and rooms were clean. They sure do get you on the parking though by charging $20 per night per car!

managementResponses.response: Glad to hear our internet was the best experience for you.  We are renovating our guests rooms this year and will have refrigerators in all rooms.  Thank you for staying with us.

review.title: EXCELLENT Internet
review.reviewText:
I want one thing from a business hotel: a place to work.   That means good internet, with fast, WIRED access (as well as wireless).   And a desk.   But mostly fast, reliable internet.

This hotel had the best internet I have ever gotten.   Done.

Otherwise it was a pretty ordinary hotel; basic, but clean.   Café was better than I expected (but also a bit expensive).
review.negativeRemarks: An in-room refrigerator.   The convenience store should have better hours (open earlier; by 8:00 I'm already gone).  Shuttle to the Caltrain.
review.locationRemarks: Location is terrible, nothing is close by but other hotels.   Trains do not normally stop at the nearest Caltrain station (Broadway).

managementResponses.response: We are glad you found our hotel's location ideal.  We thank you for your business and hope to see you again!

review.title: nice hotel and good service ,
review.reviewText:
good hotel
very convenient location
good staff
close location and very clean rooms
room service is good 
and they have a nice bar
review.locationRemarks: great location close to airport and to major highways

managementResponses.response: We are renovating our guest rooms this year and hope to see you back.

review.title: Close to Airport
review.reviewText: It's close to the airport, free shuttle takes 10min to get there, large rooms, close to the water and near baseball field. Not much else going on in the area. Hotel is a little bit dated, but very well maintained. WiFi is fast.

managementResponses.response: We apologize for not meeting your expectations.  We are renovating our guest rooms this year and hope to have another chance to serve you.

review.title: Extremely expensive for a 2 star hotel.
review.reviewText:
Old and dated hotel, Should have been worth $125 / night.  Had to look for shampoo at 1 am.  Beds uncomfortable.
Maybe should have slept in my rental car.

managementResponses.response: We are pleased to hear you found our hotel and staff wonderful!  Thank you very much!

review.reviewText: Excellent Hotel & Wonderful Staff  Everyone was very nice, Housekeepers friendly, kind & thorough, Room Service was great, Front desk was quick and very nice.  Even parking lot attendants great

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are renovating all our guest rooms this year and plan to do our lobby next year.  We hope you will be back to experience the changes!

review.title: Nice hotel for reasonable price.
review.reviewText: Hotel was easily accessible from SFO airport and near restaurants and shopping in Burlingame.  My package included breakfast and a drink from the bar each day and both were very good.  The room was comfortable and clean and there was minimal noise during my stay.  You do have to pay for parking.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenient to airport, clean, daily breakfast, comfortable room.
review.negativeRemarks: Nearing time for some renovations, especially the lobby area.

managementResponses.response: We are sorry for not meeting your expectations.  We are renovating our guest rooms this year and hope you will give us another chance to serve you.

review.title: Needs an upgrade
review.reviewText: The room was stuck in a time warp, needs a lot of upgrades. The curtains and carpet were so dirty and old. There was a hole in the bathroom door. The ceiling tiles in bathroom were disgustingly old and dirty. I wouldn't recommend this hotel to anyone.
